attributes.action: David Cameron to sanction Jesse Norman unless he apologizes to Paula Radcliffe
attributes.background: Quote from a hearing of the culture, media and sport select committee, Norman asks  “When you hear the London Marathon, potentially the winners or medallists at the London Marathon, potentially British athletes are under suspicion for very high levels of blood doping - how do you feel about that?”

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister, in his capacity as Prime Minister, does not have the power to sanction individual MPs.

If you would like Mr Cameron to take action in his capacity as the leader of the Conservative Party, you could contact the Conservative Party about this directly.
